name: Classic Heritage Denim Jacket
description: A rugged denim jacket with vintage fade, reinforced stitching and two front pockets — ideal for casual wear or layering over hoodies.

name: Urban Stretch Slim Fit Chinos
description: Comfortable slim-fit chinos made from stretch cotton blend. Great for everyday wear or semi-formal outings. Lightweight and breathable for year-round use.

name: Women’s Boho Summer Maxi Dress
description: Flowy maxi dress with floral print and adjustable straps — perfect for summer outings or beach vacations. Soft cotton fabric that drapes gently.

name: Premium Merino Wool V-Neck Sweater
description: Luxurious merino wool sweater that provides warmth without bulk. Ideal for winter layering or smart-casual office wear.

name: Classic Leather Belt (Brown)
description: Genuine leather belt with brushed metal buckle. Durable and timeless — pairs well with jeans or formal trousers.

name: Unisex Cotton Crew-Neck T-Shirt (Pack of 2)
description: Soft cotton crew-neck T-shirts in neutral colors. Comfortable for daily wear, easy to wash and durable.

name: Men’s Waterproof Windbreaker Jacket
description: Lightweight windbreaker with water-resistant coating and hood. Great for rainy seasons, travel or outdoor activities.

name: Women’s Classic Fit Denim Jeans
description: Straight-leg denim jeans with mid-rise waist, pre-washed for softness and comfort. Durable stitching, suitable for everyday wear.

name: Athletic Running Shorts (Unisex)
description: Breathable polyester-spandex blend shorts with elastic waistband and side pockets. Great for workouts or casual summer wear.

name: Classic Polo Shirt (Men)
description: Cotton-pique polo shirt with ribbed collar and cuffed sleeves. Versatile casual shirt — can be worn with jeans or chinos.

name: AlphaSound Wireless ANC Earbuds
description: Compact true-wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 30 h battery life (with case), IPX5 water resistance and modern Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity. Ideal for daily commutes and music lovers.

name: ZenBook 14" Ultra-Slim Laptop
description: Lightweight 14-inch laptop with 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SSD and high-resolution display — perfect for developers, students or professionals demanding portability and power.

name: 4K Smart LED TV 55"
description: Slim-bezel 55-inch 4K Smart LED TV with HDR, built-in streaming apps and multiple HDMI ports. Great for home theatre, binge-watching or gaming setup.

name: Bluetooth Fitness Smartwatch
description: Water-resistant fitness smartwatch with heart-rate monitor, sleep tracking, notifications and up to 7 days battery. Suitable for everyday health tracking and workouts.

name: Portable Power Bank 20,000 mAh
description: High-capacity lithium-ion power bank with dual USB-C & USB-A output, quick-charge support and compact form — ideal for travel and charging on the go.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Keyboard & Mouse Combo
description: Slim wireless keyboard with silent keys and ergonomic mouse. Long battery life and plug-and-play setup — good for home office or programming work.

name: Noise-Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones with deep bass, active noise cancellation and comfortable cushioning. Excellent for music, video calls or long coding sessions.

name: USB-C 65W Fast Charger Adapter
description: Compact 65 W USB-C charger supporting laptops, tablets and phones. Provides quick charge for devices while traveling or working remotely.

name: 1080p Webcam with Microphone
description: Plug-and-play 1080p webcam ideal for video calls, remote meetings or online classes. Built-in microphone, adjustable clip and USB connection.

name: Smart Wi-Fi LED Bulb (Set of 2)
description: Energy-efficient Wi-Fi enabled LED bulbs with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Perfect for smart-home lighting setups.

name: The Quantum Architect (Hardcover)
description: A gripping science-fiction novel exploring futuristic AI societies, power dynamics and human identity — ideal for fans of thought-provoking speculative fiction.

name: Mastering SQLAlchemy & Async Python
description: Comprehensive technical guide covering asynchronous programming in Python, SQLAlchemy ORM patterns, best practices and real-world examples — useful for backend developers and engineers.

name: Culinary Art: Easy Recipes for Home Chefs
description: Beautifully illustrated cookbook with over 100 easy-to-follow recipes for everyday home cooking — from starters to desserts. Great for beginners and culinary enthusiasts alike.

name: Mindfulness & Minimalist Living
description: Non-fiction lifestyle book offering practical tips on simplifying life, mindfulness, and creating a peaceful home environment. Inspiring read for self-improvement seekers.

name: History of Ancient Civilizations (Vol. I)
description: Detailed historical account of ancient empires and civilizations, covering geography, culture and political systems. Informative and well-researched reference work.

name: Deep Learning Essentials: From Scratch to Production
description: Technical book covering deep learning fundamentals, neural networks, production-ready model deployment, and hands-on Python code examples.

name: Children’s Illustrated Fairy Tales
description: Beautifully illustrated collection of classic fairy tales for children — ideal as bedtime stories or gifts for young readers.

name: Travel Diaries: Tales from the Road
description: Memoir-style collection of travel stories from around the world, capturing cultures, adventures and human connections. A breezy, inspiring read for wanderlust souls.

name: Modern Interior Design Ideas
description: Coffee-table style book showcasing modern interior design, home décor inspiration and practical tips for organizing your living space beautifully.

name: Beginner’s Guide to Gardening & Home Plants
description: Practical guide for first-time home gardeners — includes plant care, indoor gardening tips and easy-to-grow plant suggestions for apartments or houses.

name: Cotton King Size Bed Sheet Set (4 pcs)
description: Soft, breathable 100% cotton bed-sheet set with pillow covers — brings comfort and elegance to your bedroom. Machine-washable and fade-resistant.

name: Modern Wall-Mount Bookshelf (5-tier)
description: Space-saving 5-tier wall-mounted bookshelf made of engineered wood — perfect for small apartments. Easy to install and ideal for books, décor or storage.

name: LED Desk Lamp with Adjustable Arm
description: Energy-efficient LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness and flexible arm — great for study, work or reading spaces.

name: Non-stick 5-Piece Cookware Set
description: Durable non-stick cookware set with frying pan, sauce pan and cooking pot — ideal for everyday home cooking. Easy to clean and scratch-resistant.

name: Microfiber Bathroom Towel Set (6 pcs)
description: Soft and highly absorbent microfiber towels — quick-drying and easy to maintain. Suitable for bathroom or gym use.

name: Digital Kitchen Scale – 5 kg capacity
description: Compact digital kitchen scale with tare function — ideal for cooking, baking or portion control. Precise and battery-powered.

name: Memory Foam Lumbar Support Cushion
description: Ergonomic lumbar support cushion for chairs or sofas — improves posture and provides back comfort during long hours of sitting.

name: Cotton Canvas Storage Box (Set of 3)
description: Foldable canvas storage boxes — perfect for organizing clothes, toys or household items. Space-saving and easy to store.

name: Aroma Scented Candle (Pack of 3)
description: Long-lasting scented candles with subtle fragrance — ideal for creating a cozy ambiance in living rooms or bedrooms.
